settlement_only.description: If true, the partner product is viewed by the Jet.com pricing alogrithm at current base rate but base commission will be charged according to agreed to commissions in settlement

start_date.description:
The data/time when the base commissions should go into affect

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on January 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

end_date.description:
The data/time when the base commissions are no longer applicable, if null this rate does not expire

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on January 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

category_id.description: The Jet browse node ID that the base commission is being applied to

base_commission.description: Jet's the base commission that Jet will charge for selling products on Jet.com
